channel.title: Macroing appeal
channel.description:
So I've been botting lately on my main account, not too much though; I've only been fishing/hunting chinchompas around 2-3 hours a day. I was just on RuneScape about 20 minutes ago, hunting chinchompas legit, then I suddenly get logged out with a permanent ban without any warnings.
So what I'm asking, is what do you recommend I do to get my account unbanned? I've had this account for 5 years and I don't feel like giving up on it now.
Image: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/offenses.jpg[/img]

item.title: Macroing appeal
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

If you believe Jagex reads the appeals, read this comment I found on a youtube video. (2nd Highest Rated Comment)

[code]tbh jagex is full of shit

i made an account to see how long i could auto on and ive autoed on it for over 6 days straight and he didnt get banned then i sat in pvp world and alched﻿ for about 2 hours on my pure he gets banned (but appeal worked =))
[/code]

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lw80qTXFLUI&feature=related

Read full topic

item.title: Macroing appeal
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“merk n a box, post:12, topic:357253”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=453767.msg3324427#msg3324427 date=1282990946]
Why is there a whole customer support credits list then?

They do check, they just use an automated message for denies and appeals.
[/quote]

where not talking about support where talking about ban appleals

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=proof%20jagex%20does%20not%20read%20appeals[/quote]If you look at the bottom of the message it says

Jagex Custommer Support
Whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: Macroing appeal
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:5, topic:357253"]Primadude, appeal from a friend house or somewhere else, and say that you were not in control of the account at that time.

You should be unbanned because they always check IP addresses.[/quote]

That doesn’t work unless you’ve played a lot at a friends house or somewhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Macroing appeal
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:1, topic:357257”]I put this in my appeal and it got accepted…here

COCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERSCOCK SUCKERS[/quote]Troll… stop.

If you do try the ‘i will hurt myself’ approach, make sure it’s convincing. ‘I’ve spent to much time and money on your game… too much of my life wasted. What’s the point of living anymore?’

Read full topic

item.title: Macroing appeal
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

Seriously, if you want it unbanned, say your going to hurt/injure yourself. Just be aware that jagex might contact local police, so I’ve heard.

Read full topic

item.title: Macroing appeal
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

E-Mail parents@jagex.com
Make the subject “Account Issue”
Send this to them:
"Hello, I am writing to you as the parent of my son, AccountName. He was recently banned for a false accusation
of a macro and using a bot to play the game for him. I must object. You see, my son has very serious case of
dementia and has not slept/has not has much sleep for several weeks. Also he is agoraphobic, so cannot go
outside. Therefore meaning he has nothing to do apart from play Runescape. That is why he has been able to stay
playing for very long amounts of time. He loves your game. Also, he rarely speaks ingame due to the being
extremely shy.

I can see why you would accuse my son of using a bot, as he has played for very long amounts of time overnight
and not speaking. But thats just because he has nothing to do and is very shy.

I hope you will read this, realise your mistake, and release the ban on my sons account.

Thanks,
MakeUpAName
AccountName Mother." This got me unbanned before hope it works at you

Read full topic
